alert.note: Alert for Hooker; Logan; McPherson; Thomas (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 10:30AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Hooker, northwestern Logan, northeastern McPherson and southern Thomas Counties through 1130 AM CDT/1030 AM MDT/... At 1029 AM CDT/929 AM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles north of Tryon, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Highway 83 crossing The Dismal River, Brown Lake and Shimmons Lake. This includes the following highways... Highway 97 between mile markers 38 and 51. Highway 83 between mile markers 119 and 140. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
